description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installer of Yahoo! Toolbar (for Internet explorer) v8.0.0.6 and earlier, with its timestamp prior to June 13, 2017, 18:18:55 allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

product.name: Installer of Yahoo! Toolbar (for Internet explorer)

enisaIdProduct.product_version: v8.0.0.6 and earlier, with its timestamp prior to June 13, 2017, 18:18:55
